item.title: Minimum viable comics
item.description: Hullo. Just before crimbo, I finally got to a point where I was ready to get feedback on Red Night. Up until this point I had only talked with people about it in vague, broad terms and discussed specifics about plot points with my wife. But no one else had read anything about it, properly. Normally I would like to get feedback throughout the development process. However, for me, that wouldn’t really work, because: a.

item.title: Site update
item.description: Hi there. I’ve done a bit of tinkering and updated the site with a new blog, a bit more info about me and details on my new comic, Red Night . I’m mostly planning to use this to share my work-in-progress, things I’m learning about the comics making process and other comic related musings. I’ve also set up Instagram and Twitter profiles for Big Stompy Robot, so please follow me there too.
